page.shortlink: Spacing Wrong with Specfic Fonts in RTF and HTML Objects
page.topic: Spacing Wrong with Specfic Fonts in RTF and HTML Objects
page.description: The reference driver can restrict precision, which can result in characters spacing being off in the produced PDF.

section.title: Solution
section.description: Go to Web Project Properties and set the Reference Driver to PRINTER.

section.title: Changing the Reference Driver
section.description: While using 'DISPLAY' is preferred, because it has been proven to be lower in resource usage, there are tradeoffs when using some fonts with RTF or HTML, which format at the word level.
